item.title: Accept n decline; fixed
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hello, i added the main dupe fix for delta… but when u click accept n decline in second window real fast u`ll loose items… Heres my declining method i used to fix the dupe

[code]case 130:
// Clicking some stuff in game
int interfaceID = inStream.readSignedByte();
if (inTrade) {
try{
client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
if(tradeConfirmed2){
antidupe();
other.antidupe();

writeLog(playerName, “Dupers”);
return;
}else{
other.declineTrade();
declineTrade();
sM(“You have declined the trade.”);
other.sM(“The other player has declined the trade.”);
}
}catch (Exception e) {
}
}
break;
[/code]

I fixed it but in the second screen if u click accept n decline real fast they’d both loose items…

I obviously wanna fix it in case people abuse the concept of tradin and make people loose there items…

Thanks help is appreciated

Read full topic
